issue.title: [C++] FileSystemDataSourceDiscovery should apply partition schemes relative to the base_dir of its selector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7058](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7058). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the absolute path of each fragment is used which leads to erroneous parse errors unless the Discovery's base directory also happens to be root of a FileSystem.
